alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 5:51PM CDT until September 05 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OKLAHOMA AND SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Luther, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Oklahoma City, eastern Edmond, Chandler, Choctaw, Harrah, Jones, Luther, Meeker, Wellston, and Warwick. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
